section.p: The configsettings_controller.properties file located in <install_pack_dir>/databases/app_db contains the configuration settings for the Azure service controller. This configuration is used for the initial setup and stored in the APP database.

section.title: CONTROLLER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the service controller.

section.title: BSS_ORGANIZATION_ID
section.p: The ID of the organization in which is responsible for the service controller. The organization must have the technology provider role.

section.title: BSS_USER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the user specified in BSS_USER_KEY for accessing .

section.title: BSS_USER_KEY
section.p: Replace <userKey> with the user key which you received with the confirmation email for your user account.
The user specified here must have the technology manager role in and belong to the organization specified in the BSS_ORGANIZATION_ID setting.
It is recommended that the user account is used only for carrying out actions on behalf of the service controller in .

section.title: BSS_USER_PWD
section.p: The password of the user specified in BSS_USER_KEY for accessing .
Replace <password> with the plain text password. The password is encrypted when it is stored in the database.
